title: 50,000 Gas cylinders to be delivered today (1)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said that it has scheduled to distribute 50,000 domestic gas cylinders on Wednesday (1) and 60% of the cylinders will be distributed to the Western Province.
Litro said another vessel carrying 3,500 MT of gas will arrive to the island on the 4th of June.
Meanwhile, people who visited dealers on Tuesday (31) to purchase gas were seen waiting in long queues.
Sri Lanka decides NOT to send pilgrims for Hajj due to worsening economic crisis
Saving lives from drowning for over seven decades, Sri Lanka Life Saving marks 75 years
